entries.meaning: One who, or that which, persuades.
(printing, historical, colloquial) A tool used to pack the type into the form.
examples: Next fit the quoins, using the “persuader” to squeeze in the pages, and tap up all around.

entries.meaning: (television) An electrode that directs electrons into a multiplier.
examples: These electrons are guided to the second dynode by the resultant electric field of this dynode and the persuader.
